strings.SS2_KEYWORD_CYBORG_PRIME: <color=#42f5b3><style=cKeywordName>Primed</style></color><style=cSub>Hitting <color=#42f5b3>Primed</color> enemies with a different attack deals an additional <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style> in an area.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_PRIMARY_LASTPRISM_DESCRIPTIO: Charge up a continuous laser that deals <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style> per second, but has <style=cIsHealth>decreased turning speed.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SECONDARY_LASER_DESCRIPTION: Fire laser blasts at up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> targets, dealing <style=cIsDamage>3x150% damage</style> and <color=#42f5b3>Priming</color> enemies.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SECONDARY_MINES_DESCRIPTION: Place a mine that repeatedly <style=cIsDamage>shocks</style> and <color=#42f5b3>Primes</color> nearby targets. Can place up to 3.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_UTILITY_TELEPORTER_DESCRIPTI: Deploy a <style=cIsUtility>warp point</style>. Reuse to <style=cIsUtility>swap</style> positions with nearby targets.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_UTILITY_TRAP_DESCRIPTION: Deploy a device that <style=cIsDamage>captures</style> low health enemies, granting <style=cIsUtility>extra money</style> and <style=cIsDamage>elite powers</style> to nearby allies.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SPECIAL_MAGNETBALL_DESCRIPTI: Fire an energetic mass for <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style>. The mass drops shards that explode for <style=cIsDamage>6x175% damage</style> and <color=#42f5b3>Prime</color> enemies.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CYBORG2_MASTERY_DESC: As Cyborg, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CYBORG2_GRANDMASTERY_DES: As Cyborg, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon.
